item.description:
La Carreta Mexican restaurant in Framingham has good food, friendly, bilingual staff, and a nice atmosphere. The restaurant is on Rt. 30 next to the post office (behind Shoppers' World).

This is a social event: "espangles/Spanglish" will be spoken if we're joined by those who don't speak Spanish (we don't want anyone to feel ignored). So,

If you're concerned about the distance or finding the place, we can carpool (just send an e-mail to Susana)

group.name: The Worcester Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Social event: Weekend lunch at La Carreta
